comments:
I'm having this bug with CDT 3.0.2 and eclipse 3.2-gtk on linux x86 arch. After
I'v created a C++ project, I get the apparently infinite loop at startup with the following log entry:

When I click ok in the error dialog it just happens again and I can't get Eclipse to start.
CDT 3.0.2 is not supported on Eclipse 3.2. Please use CDT 3.1.

(In reply to comment #1)
> CDT 3.0.2 is not supported on Eclipse 3.2. Please use CDT 3.1.
> 
In that case, http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/index_project.php has an out of date link. I followed the link to a downloads page there (http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/cdt-home/downloads/main.html?cvsroot=Tools_Project) which has 3.0.2 as the latest version. I'll get 3.1 from the home page now, thanks.
